# Specifications

## Power Supply/Other

- **Camera size (W × H × D):**  
  121.3 mm × 72.9 mm × 32.7 mm / 4.78 in. × 2.87 in. × 1.29 in. (excluding projections)

- **Camera weight:**  
  Approx. 315 g / 11.1 oz., excluding battery, accessories, and memory card

- **Shooting weight:**  
  Approx. 364 g / 12.8 oz., including battery and memory card

- **Operating conditions:**  
  - Temperature: 0 °C to +40 °C / +32 °F to +104 °F  
  - Humidity: 10% to 80% (no condensation)

## Wireless Transmitter

### Wireless LAN

- **Standards:**  
  IEEE 802.11b/g/n (standard wireless protocol)

- **Operating frequency (center frequency):**  
  2,412 MHz–2,462 MHz (11 channels)

- **Access protocols:**  
  Infrastructure

### Bluetooth®

- **Standards:**  
  Bluetooth version 4.2 (Bluetooth Low Energy)

- **Operating frequency (center frequency):**  
  2,402 MHz–2,480 MHz
